navigation.default_navigation_mode_activated: Navigation On: Select and use left(←) and right (→) arrows to iterate, up (↑) and down (↓) arrows to navigate paths. Press 'N' to exit.
navigation.default_navigation_mode_deactivated: Navigation Off: Press 'N' for default navigation, 'ALT+N' for position navigation.
navigation.default_navigation_paths: Use up (↑) and down (↓) arrows to switch between multiple paths.
navigation.local_navigation_mode_activated: Position based Nav On: Select element and use left(←) and right(→) to navigate. Press 'ALT+N' to exit.
navigation.local_navigation_mode_deactivated: Position based Nav Off: Press 'N' for default navigation, 'ALT+N' for position navigation.

resize.resize_mode_activated: Resize On: Use plus(+) and minus(-) to resize, 'CTRL'+'0' for default size. Press 'ESC' to exit.
resize.resize_mode_deactivated: Resize Off: Press 'ALT'+'R' for resize mode.

grid.zoom-in-grid: Select a digit from 1-9 to zoom in on the respective box.
